Package dbproject.game

Class Board

java.lang.Object
dbproject.game.Board
public class Board extends Object
Board for the Dots and Boxes game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ANSI_BLUE
     
    static final String
    ANSI_RED
     
    static final String
    ANSI_RESET
     
    static final int
    DIM
    Dimension of the board, i.e., if set to 3, the board has 6 rows and 6 columns.

    • horizontalIndex

      public int horizontalIndex(int row, int col)
      Calculates the index in the linear array of lines from a horizontal line represented by (row, col) pair.
      Parameters:
      row - row index of horizontal line
      col - column index of horizontal line
      Returns:
      the line index belonging to the horizontal (row,col)-line

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • isLine

      public boolean isLine(int location)
      Returns true if location is a valid index of a line on the board.
      Parameters:
      location - index of line to check
      Returns:
      true if 0 <= location < (DIM-1)*DIM + (DIM-1)*DIM

    • isHorizontalLine

      public boolean isHorizontalLine(int location)
      Returns true if location is a valid index of a horizontal line on the board.
      Parameters:
      location - index of line to check
      Returns:
      true if line is horizontal

    • isVerticalLine

      public boolean isVerticalLine(int location)
      Returns true if location is a valid location of a vertical line on the board.
      Parameters:
      location - index of line to check
      Returns:
      true if line is vertical

    • isBox

      public boolean isBox(int location)
      Returns true if location is a valid index of a box on the board.
      Parameters:
      location - index of box to check
      Returns:
      true if 0 <= location < (DIM-1)*(DIM-1)

    • isBox

      public boolean isBox(int row, int column)
      Returns true if location is a valid index of a box represented by (row, column) on the board.
      Parameters:
      row - row index of box
      column - column index of box
      Returns:
      true if 0 <= row < (DIM-1) && 0 <= column < (DIM-1)

      Returns:
      the content on the line

      Parameters:
      location - the box number
      playerNumber - player that completed the box

    • completeBox

      public int[] completeBox(int location)
      returns the index of the two boxes the line completes, or -1 if it does not complete a box.
      Parameters:
      location - of the line
      Returns:
      array of two integers which contains the indices of the boxes the line completed, or -1 if it did not complete a box.

    • completeBoxAbove

      public int completeBoxAbove(int location)
      return the index of the box above a horizontal line at location, which is completed by this line, or -1 if this line does not complete a box.
      Parameters:
      location - of the horizontal line
      Returns:
      the index of the box the line, at location, completes, or -1 if it does not complete a box.

    • completeBoxUnder

      Parameters:
      location - of the horizontal line
      Returns:
      the index of the box the line, at location, completes, or -1 if it does not complete a box.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a String representation of this board. In addition to the current situation, the String also shows the numbering of the fields.
      Overrides:

      Returns:
      the game situation as String

    • compareTo

      public boolean compareTo(Board board)
      compares this board to another board, returns true if they are the same, or false if not.
      Parameters:
      board - you want to compare this board to
      Returns:
      true if the board is the same as this board, false if not
